
Convert these binary to desimal
1. 11000101
2. 1110101
3. 111100011
4. 101010100
5. 1001101
6. 110111110
7. 10111101
8. 110001000
9. 101110100
10. 111001

2. 190
3. 62
4. 212
5. 177
6. 202
7. 72
8. 113
9. 444
10. 255

Add these binary numbers
1. 101111010 + 10101011
2. 11011010 + 11000101
3. 1100000 + 100010
4. 100000101 + 10001110
5. 111110100 + 110011
6. 111010001 + 110111100
7. 11100111 + 110111011
8. 110110101 + 1110101
9. 11110011 + 100000
10. 111010110 + 110010

Subtract these binary numbers
1. 101011001 - 100010001
2. 1010110 - 11110
3. 111001100 - 100110000
4. 110011111 - 1011010
5. 111001010 - 100010111
6. 1101011 - 11000
7. 1001111 - 1000011
8. 110101010 - 101000
9. 10100100 - 111111
10. 111010111 - 101110101

Multiply these binary numbers
1. 100010100 * 101
2. 110011001 * 1000
3. 111010001 * 1000
4. 111011101 * 111
5. 111010111 * 111
6. 100001 * 110
7. 110110 * 111
8. 11010001 * 1000
9. 11010100 * 111
10. 111011 * 111

Divide these binary numbers
1. 111100101 / 101
2. 101101110 / 110
3. 10101001 / 1101
4. 111000000 / 1110
5. 101011111 / 1101
6. 10001010 / 110
7. 1011010 / 101
8. 110001111 / 111
9. 1001110 / 110
10. 100111011 / 1111

Find the ones complement of these binary numbers
1. 110111110
2. 111010111
3. 11100011
4. 11000
5. 11001100
6. 110010100
7. 1011100
8. 111001011
9. 100001000
10. 1101110

Find the twos complement of these binary numbers
1. 1001000
2. 101101011
3. 100110
4. 111100100
5. 11001101
6. 110010010
7. 100010100
8. 11011
9. 111000001
10. 101001111

1. 191.11745799449045
2. 374.44245770702867
3. 220.92178108647616
4. 473.96780602308274
5. 286.36386961035885
6. 244.62341769078463
7. 318.65015236310694
8. 33.79748446630572
9. 228.88643394069643
